statements: SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients WHERE prescriptions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT AVG(patient_id) FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions LIKE '%ibuprofen%';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name FROM patients WHERE DATE(date_of_birth) = CURDATE();
SELECT DISTINCT medical_history FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM patients GROUP BY patient_id HAVING num_prescriptions > 2;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003);
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions NOT LIKE '%antibiotics%';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_dob FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date_of_birth)) AS avg_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE DATE(date_of_birth) < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_id > 100;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patients WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_id, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS avg_patient_id FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients ORDER BY prescriptions DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT patient_id, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, CONCAT(patient_name, ' - ', medical_history) AS patient_details FROM patients;
SELECT DISTINCT prescriptions FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions LIKE '%aspirin%';
SELECT patient_id, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y') AS year_of_birth FROM patients GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y');
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(prescriptions) AS total_prescriptions FROM patients GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_id, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions REGEXP '^[0-9]+$';
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE prescriptions IN ('Insulin', 'Ibuprofen');
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS total_unique_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%M %d, %Y') AS formatted_date FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, prescriptions FROM patients WHERE DATE(date_of_birth) = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_id, medicine_name, dosage, frequency FROM Prescriptions;
SELECT name, gender, blood_type FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_id, medicine_name, dosage, date_prescribed FROM Prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE frequency='Twice a day';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE dob < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE date_prescribed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM PatientInformation WHERE blood_type='O-';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT DISTINCT blood_type FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT MAX(dob) FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT MIN(date_prescribed) FROM Prescriptions;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob FROM PatientInformation LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT name, medical_history FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_id, name, dob, gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE dob >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, name, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE LENGTH(medical_history) > 100;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.medicine_name, p.date_prescribed, pi.name FROM Prescriptions p JOIN PatientInformation pi ON p.patient_id = pi.patient_id;
SELECT pi.name, p.medicine_name, p.dosage FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE p.date_prescribed BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(prescription_id) AS num_prescriptions FROM Prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;

SELECT gender, AVG(prescriptions_count) AS avg_prescriptions FROM (SELECT pi.gender, COUNT(p.prescription_id) AS prescriptions_count FROM PatientInformation pi LEFT JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.gender) AS subquery GROUP BY gender;
SELECT pi.gender, pi.blood_type, COUNT(p.patient_id) AS num_patients FROM PatientInformation pi LEFT JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.gender, pi.blood_type;
SELECT name, SUM(LENGTH(medical_history)) AS total_medical_history_length FROM PatientInformation GROUP BY name HAVING total_medical_history_length > 1000;
SELECT pi.name, COUNT(distinct p.medicine_name) AS unique_medicines FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.name HAVING unique_medicines > 5;
SELECT medication_category, COUNT(medicine_name) AS num_medicines FROM Prescriptions GROUP BY medication_category HAVING num_medicines > 10;
SELECT pi.name, MAX(p.date_prescribed) AS last_prescription_date FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.name;
SELECT pi.name, MIN(p.date_prescribed) AS first_prescription_date FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.name;
SELECT pi.name, AVG(DATEDIFF(p.date_prescribed, pi.dob)) AS avg_age_at_prescription FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.name;
SELECT pi.name, COUNT(p.prescription_id) AS num_prescriptions FROM PatientInformation pi LEFT JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.name ORDER BY num_prescriptions DESC;

SELECT pi.name, p.medicine_name, p.dosage, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY pi.name ORDER BY p.date_prescribed DESC) AS prescription_rank FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id;

SELECT name, COUNT(prescription_id) AS num_prescriptions FROM PatientInformation LEFT JOIN Prescriptions ON PatientInformation.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id GROUP BY name HAVING num_prescriptions < 5;
SELECT DISTINCT pi.name, p.medicine_name FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE p.dosage LIKE '%mg' AND p.frequency = 'Daily';

SELECT pi.name, MIN(p.date_prescribed) AS first_prescription_date, MAX(p.date_prescribed) AS last_prescription_date, DATEDIFF(MAX(p.date_prescribed), MIN(p.date_prescribed)) AS days_between_first_last FROM PatientInformation pi JOIN Prescriptions p ON pi.patient_id = p.patient_id GROUP BY pi.name HAVING days_between_first_last > 30;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM medical_history;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM prescriptions;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%';
SELECT p.patient_name, mh.diagnosis, pr.medication_name FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_history mh ON p.patient_id = mh.patient_id INNER JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%m/%d/%Y') AS formatted_dob FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS prescription_count FROM prescriptions GROUP BY patient_id;

SELECT patient_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(prescription_date, date_of_birth)) AS avg_days_to_prescribe FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM medical_history;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(prescription_date) AS latest_prescription_date FROM prescriptions INNER JOIN patients ON prescriptions.patient_id = patients.patient_id GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, prescription_date FROM prescriptions WHERE prescription_date = (SELECT MAX(prescription_date) FROM prescriptions);
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis = 'Hypertension');
SELECT patient_name, DATEDIFF(NOW(), date_of_birth) AS age_in_days FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, prescription_date FROM patients INNER JOIN prescriptions ON patients.patient_id = prescriptions.patient_id WHERE prescription_date = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis, m.treatment FROM patients p INNER JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id;
SELECT p.patient_name, p.date_of_birth, pr.medication_name FROM patients p LEFT JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage, prescription_date FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE prescription_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT p.patient_name, p.gender, m.diagnosis, pr.medication_name FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_prescriptions FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_patient FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(date_of_birth) AS youngest_patient FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), date_of_birth)) AS avg_age FROM patients;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM patients;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis FROM patients p LEFT JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id WHERE m.diagnosis IS NULL;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients UNION SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM prescriptions;

SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id UNION SELECT p.patient_name, pr.medication_name FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM patients p LEFT JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.prescription_id IS NULL;
SELECT p.patient_name, m.diagnosis FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, prescription_date FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM patients p JOIN medical_history m ON p.patient_id = m.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING num_records > 1;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM Patient;
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM MedicalHistory;
SELECT * FROM Prescription;
SELECT patient_id, medication FROM Prescription;
SELECT * FROM Doctor;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM Doctor;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM Doctor;
SELECT Patient.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT Patient.patient_name, Prescription.medication FROM Patient JOIN Prescription ON Patient.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id;
SELECT Patient.patient_name, Doctor.doctor_name FROM Patient JOIN Doctor ON Patient.patient_id = Doctor.doctor_id;
SELECT MedicalHistory.diagnosis, Prescription.medication FROM MedicalHistory JOIN Prescription ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id;
SELECT Doctor.doctor_name, Doctor.specialization FROM Doctor WHERE doctor_id = 1;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, Prescription.medication FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id JOIN Prescription ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id;
SELECT Doctor.doctor_name, Patient.patient_name FROM Doctor JOIN Patient ON Doctor.doctor_id = Patient.patient_id;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, Prescription.medication, Doctor.doctor_name FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id JOIN Prescription ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id JOIN Doctor ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Doctor.doctor_id;

SELECT Patient.patient_name, Patient.date_of_birth, MedicalHistory.diagnosis, Prescription.medication, Doctor.doctor_name FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id JOIN Prescription ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id JOIN Doctor ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Doctor.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patient ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT Patient.patient_id, Patient.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT Patient.patient_name, Prescription.medication FROM Patient JOIN Prescription ON Patient.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Prescription WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT Doctor.doctor_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis FROM Doctor JOIN MedicalHistory ON Doctor.doctor_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT Patient.patient_name, Doctor.doctor_name FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id JOIN Doctor ON MedicalHistory.doctor_id = Doctor.doctor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patient;
SELECT AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_duration FROM Prescription;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM MedicalHistory GROUP BY doctor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions, medication FROM Prescription GROUP BY medication;
SELECT doctor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Doctor LEFT JOIN MedicalHistory ON Doctor.doctor_id = MedicalHistory.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM Patient LEFT JOIN Prescription ON Patient.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS total_days_supply FROM Patient JOIN Prescription ON Patient.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(date_created) AS first_record_date FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicaljsonHistory.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(date_created) AS last_record_date FROM Patient JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT DISTINCT diagnosis FROM MedicalHistory;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_days_supply FROM Patient JOIN Prescription ON Patient.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM Patient LEFT JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patient.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT doctor_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS avg_prescription_duration FROM Doctor JOIN MedicalHistory ON Doctor.doctor_id = MedicalHistory.doctor_id JOIN Prescription ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id GROUP BY doctor_name;

SELECT doctor_name, SUM(DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date)) AS total_prescription_duration FROM Doctor JOIN MedicalHistory ON Doctor.doctor_id = MedicalHistory.doctor_id JOIN Prescription ON MedicalHistory.patient_id = Prescription.patient_id GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM MedicalHistory;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM MedicalHistory;
SELECT * FROM Prescriptions;
SELECT prescription_name, quantity, dosage FROM Prescriptions;
SELECT * FROM Doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM Appointments;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, prescription_name, quantity FROM Patients JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date, reason FROM Doctors JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE blood_type = 'AB';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE doctor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT appointment_date, reason FROM Appointments WHERE reason LIKE '%consultation%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE blood_type='A+';
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalHistory.diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT patient_name, prescription_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM Doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, count(Appointments.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM Patients INNER JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id GROUP BY Patients.patient_name;
SELECT doctor_name, count(Appointments.appointment_id) AS appointment_count FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctor_name;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM Patients INNER JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id WHERE quantity > 30;

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, appointment_date FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id INNER JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT doctor_name, patient_name, appointment_date FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id INNER JOIN Patients ON Appointments.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE reason='Follow-up visit';
SELECT patient_name, prescription_name, dosage FROM Patients INNER JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, appointment_date FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, blood_type FROM Patients WHERE blood_type IN ('A+', 'B-');
SELECT doctor_name, appointment_date, reason FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id WHERE appointment_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalHistory ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalHistory.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT patient_name, prescription_name, dosage FROM Patients INNER JOIN Prescriptions ON Patients.patient_id = Prescriptions.patient_id WHERE quantity >= 20 AND quantity <= 50;

SELECT doctor_name, specialty, appointment_date FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Appointments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Appointments.doctor_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-12-01' AND appointment_date <= '2023-01-31';
